snippet: The Yankees are closing in on a one-year agreement with Travis Hafner, a former Cleveland Indians slugger.
abstract: Designated hitter Travis Hafner agrees to one-year, incentive-laden deal with New York Yankees.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees are closing in on a one-year agreement with Travis Hafner, a former Cleveland Indians slugger.

headline.seo: Yankees Near Deal to Sign Travis Hafner as D.H.
headline.main: Yankees Near a Deal to Sign Hafner as D.H.
headline.print_headline: Yankees Near A Deal to Sign Hafner as D.H.
